com.intel.icecp.core.security.keymanagement

Interface IcecpKeyManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KeyStoreBasedManager, MockKeyManager

    public interface IcecpKeyManager
    Key management interface for ICECP It provides APIs to retrieve and store keys and certificates, and to verify certificates validity;

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSymmetricKey(URI keyId, SymmetricKey k)
      Stores a given symmetric key under the given identifier.
      void deleteSymmetricKey(URI keyId)
      Deletes the symmetric key with a given identifier.
      Certificate getCertificate(URI certificateID)
      Retrieves the certificate with a given id; looks it up from the given channel if necessary
      PrivateKey getPrivateKey(URI keyId)
      Retrieves the private key corresponding to a given identifier
      PublicKey getPublicKey(URI keyId)
      Retrieves the public key corresponding to a given identifier
      SymmetricKey getSymmetricKey(URI keyId)
      Retrieves the symmetric key corresponding to a given name
      Certificate verifyCertificateChain(byte[] certificate)
      Verifies the given certificates chain (bytes)

    • Method Detail

      • getPublicKey

        PublicKey getPublicKey(URI keyId)
                throws KeyManagerException
        Retrieves the public key corresponding to a given identifier
        Parameters:
        keyId - Unique string identifier for the public key
        Returns:
        The public key, if available
        Throws:
        KeyManagerException - In case of error doing key lookup

      • getPrivateKey

        PrivateKey getPrivateKey(URI keyId)
                  throws KeyManagerException
        Retrieves the private key corresponding to a given identifier
        Parameters:
        keyId - Unique string identifier of the private key
        Returns:
        The public key, if available
        Throws:
        KeyManagerException - In case of error doing key lookup

      • getSymmetricKey

        SymmetricKey getSymmetricKey(URI keyId)
                      throws KeyManagerException
        Retrieves the symmetric key corresponding to a given name
        Parameters:
        keyId - Unique string identifier of the symmetric key
        Returns:
        The public key, if available
        Throws:
        KeyManagerException - In case of error doing key lookup

      • addSymmetricKey

        void addSymmetricKey(URI keyId,
                     SymmetricKey k)
              throws KeyManagerException
        Stores a given symmetric key under the given identifier.
        Parameters:
        keyId - The identifier to use
        k - Symmetric key to store
        Throws:
        KeyManagerException - In case of error

      • deleteSymmetricKey

        void deleteSymmetricKey(URI keyId)
                 throws KeyManagerException
        Deletes the symmetric key with a given identifier.
        Parameters:
        keyId - Key identifier
        Throws:
        KeyManagerException - In case of error

      • getCertificate

        Certificate getCertificate(URI certificateID)
                    throws KeyManagerException
        Retrieves the certificate with a given id; looks it up from the given channel if necessary
        Parameters:
        certificateID - Unique certificate identifier
        Returns:
        The certificate corresponding to the given identifier
        Throws:
        KeyManagerException - In case of error (e.g., certificate not found, certificate not valid, etc.)

      • verifyCertificateChain

        Certificate verifyCertificateChain(byte[] certificate)
                            throws KeyManagerException
        Verifies the given certificates chain (bytes)
        Parameters:
        certificate - Encoded certificate chain
        Returns:
        The first certificate of the given key chain
        Throws:
        KeyManagerException - In case of error in verifying the certificate chain
